price: Misle li oni koji čine zla djela da ćemo s njima postupiti jednako kao s onima koji vjeruju i dobra djela čine, da će u ovom životu i nakon smrti biti isti?! Kako loše rasuđuju!
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱجۡتَرَحُواْ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن نَّجۡعَلَهُمۡ كَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ سَوَآءٗ مَّحۡيَاهُمۡ وَمَمَاتُهُمۡۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: am ḥasiba alladhīna ij'taraḥū al-sayiāti an najʿalahum ka-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti sawāan maḥyāhum wamamātuhum sāa mā yaḥkumūna
